headline: Show HN: Browserslist website – configure target browsers for front-end tools
description: Browserslist is the shared browser compatibility config for popular JavaScript tools like Autoprefixer, Babel, ESLint, Next.js, PostCSS, and Webpack. Now it's got a new website at https://browsersl.ist where you can test audience coverage and behold some hedgehogs.
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Browserslist网站--为前端工具配置目标浏览器
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Browserslist網站--為前端工具配置目標瀏覽器
